nml_option.name: config_AM_globalStats_enable
nml_option.description: If true, ocean analysis member global_stats is called.

nml_option.name: config_AM_globalStats_compute_interval
nml_option.description: Timestamp determining how often analysis member computation should be performed.

nml_option.name: config_AM_globalStats_compute_on_startup
nml_option.description: Logical flag determining if an analysis member computation occurs on start-up.

nml_option.name: config_AM_globalStats_write_on_startup
nml_option.description: Logical flag determining if an analysis member computation occurs on start-up.

nml_option.name: config_AM_globalStats_text_file
nml_option.description: If true, print global stats to a text file as well as streams.

nml_option.name: config_AM_globalStats_directory
nml_option.description: subdirectory to write eddy census text files

nml_option.name: config_AM_globalStats_output_stream
nml_option.description: Name of the stream that the globalStats analysis member should get information from.

package.name: globalStatsAMPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required for the global statistics analysis member.

var.name: areaCellGlobal
var.description: sum of the areaCell variable over the full domain, used to normalize global statistics

var.name: areaEdgeGlobal
var.description: sum of the areaEdge variable over the full domain, used to normalize global statistics

var.name: areaTriangleGlobal
var.description: sum of the areaTriangle variable over the full domain, used to normalize global statistics

var.name: volumeCellGlobal
var.description: sum of the volumeCell variable over the full domain, used to normalize global statistics

var.name: volumeEdgeGlobal
var.description: sum of the volumeEdge variable over the full domain, used to normalize global statistics

var.name: CFLNumberGlobal
var.description: maximum CFL number over the full domain

var.name: landIceFloatingAreaSum
var.description: sum of areaCell where landIceMask == 1, used to normalize global statistics in land-ice cavities

var.name: layerThicknessMin
var.description: Minimum global value of layerThickness in ocean cells.

var.name: normalVelocityMin
var.description: Minimum global value of normalVelocity on ocean edges.

var.name: tangentialVelocityMin
var.description: Minimum global value of tangentialVelocity on ocean edges.

var.name: layerThicknessEdgeMin
var.description: Minimum global value of layerThicknessEdgeMean on ocean edges.

var.name: relativeVorticityMin
var.description: Minimum global value of relativeVorticity on ocean vertices.

var.name: enstrophyMin
var.description: Minimum global value of enstrophy in ocean cells.

var.name: kineticEnergyCellMin
var.description: Minimum global value of kineticEnergy in ocean cells.

var.name: normalizedAbsoluteVorticityMin
var.description: Minimum global value of normalizedAbsoluteVorticity on ocean vertices.

var.name: pressureMin
var.description: Minimum global value of pressure in ocean cells.

var.name: montgomeryPotentialMin
var.description: Minimum global value of the Montgomery Potential in ocean cells.

var.description: Minimum global value of previous step layerThickness in ocean cells.

var.description: Minimum global value of layer thickness tendency due to frazil formation in ocean cells.

var.name: totalVolumeChange
var.description: Total volume change of the ocean relative to previous timestep

var.name: netFreshwaterInput
var.description: Net fresh water change (input-output) over the timestep due to surface fluxes and frazil formation

var.name: absoluteFreshWaterConservation
var.description: Difference between change in ocean volume and freshwater input

var.name: relativeFreshWaterConservation
var.description: Difference between change in ocean volume and freshwater input divided by volume change
